PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09342011-09-22,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Insurance Business (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INSURANCE BUSINESS (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, in order to extend existing policy to the web pages of deposit-taking financial institutions, in order to help ensure a greater consistency between the promotion of insurance products permitted on the web pages of deposit-taking financial institutions and the promotion that is permitted in their branches.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0186 Publication Date: 2011-10-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Insurance Business (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the INSURANCE BUSINESS (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, in order to extend existing policy to the web pages of deposit-taking financial institutions, in order to help ensure a greater consistency between the promotion of insurance products permitted on the web pages of deposit-taking financial institutions and the promotion that is permitted in their branches.
